text: The LTP Charleston Pro Tennis is a tennis tournament held on outdoor clay courts at LTP Tennis in Charleston, South Carolina, United States. It has been held since 2015 and is part of the ITF Women's Circuit as a $60,000 and $100,000 event. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year
